This is a list of the files provided to reproduce the results of the book chapter
Bartolucci F., Pennoni, F. (2020).
Alcuni modelli per dati di conteggio  con applicazione allâ€™epidemia COVID-19. Morlacchi Editore. 

The files are the following:

## Code 

- Umbria_and_Italy_data.R: extract the data from the github repository of the Italian Civil Protection

- model_now_positive_UM_IT.R: estimate the models for Umbria and Italy

- Result_Covid_IT_UM.R: provides the results of the paper

## Data and Results 

- dataUmbria.Rdata: contains data used for the analysis for Umbria

- dataItaly.Rdata: contains data used for the analysis for Italy

- Umbria_Italy_model_now_positive.Rdata: containts the results of the estimated models
